item.title: New Courses
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
Of course, you may already be aware of the Free Online Ruby 'Core' course being offered at http://rubylearning.com.

But I wanted to mention the works of a "Testing Basics'' course being developed, and should be available soon.

Satoshi is also offering a Shoes Course, that has been mentioned by none other than _Why (that lucky stiff!).  Oh, I meant Satoshi, but _Why, too.

In either case, Satoshi has been hard at work improving the course, and _Why has been busy developing Shoes, and both are excellent reasons to sign up for the $5.00 course!

There are a few other projects currently underway, and with any luck, there may be a couple of 'full-time' course offerings.  Of course, even current courses are always under development, due to active participants!  It is part of what makes RubyLearning.Org a great place to learn!

Hope to see you there!
